name: Emmanuel Konneh
title: President & Founder
description: Master candidate in Civil Engineering with 5 years of leadership experience in student organizations. Passionate about infrastructure development in Africa.

name: Grace Mulbah
title: Vice President
description: MBA student specializing in International Business. Former cultural committee chair with expertise in event management and community engagement.

name: James Pewee
title: Secretary General
description: Medical student with strong organizational skills. Coordinates academic support programs and maintains official records and communications.

name: Sarah Konneh
title: Treasurer
description: Finance major with experience in budget management and fundraising. Oversees financial planning and scholarship fund administration.

name: Moses Flomo
title: Cultural Director
description: Fine Arts student and traditional musician. Leads cultural preservation initiatives and organizes heritage celebrations and educational programs.

name: Ruth Gaye
title: Academic Coordinator
description: Education graduate student focused on curriculum development. Coordinates tutoring programs and academic support services for members.
